articles.author: Andrew Goudsward
articles.description: A federal judge in Tennessee failed to rule on Wednesday on the legal status of Kilmar Abrego, the migrant returned to the U.S. after being wrongly deported to El Salvador, prolonging uncertainty about the fate of Abrego, who was in the courtroom.
articles.title: US judge fails to rule on status of returned deportee Abrego; future of smuggling case uncertain
